summary: Ah Riverwood. The first town that you visit really leaves a mark on you. Leaves a great memory of kind people and a place where you can go to get to a blacksmith straight out of fast travel. But after a while, it just kind of get's boring. Doesn't it?
descriptionHtml:
[b]NOTICE: Do not install this if you plan to do the main questline. 
[/b]
Ah Riverwood. The first town that you visit really leaves a mark on you. Leaves a great memory of kind people and a place where you can go to get to a blacksmith straight out of fast travel. But after a while, it just kind of get's boring. Doesn't it? 

Yes. Yes it does. 

So, I decided to improve upon Riverwood immensly. And thus, everyone is now a bear. (Except Sven, because ???? Sven.). SO upon clicking that nice 'ol download button You will improve your Riverwood immersive experience by about 9,302,454,932,013 (roughly). 
[b]
Pros: [/b]
Bears 
No more waiting for Alvor to get out of the way so you can use the forge 
Bears 
Sven no longer plays the lute because he is a chicken 
Bears 
Epic bear fights against a dragon 
Everyone is a bear 

[b]Cons: [/b]
All the kids now think they're orphaned 
Majority of the dialogue options are now gone 
All Riverwood related quests are gone because no one can give them

[b]Download Today!
[/b]
Twitter- @BriggsyCantNac
author: Briggsy- AntiMat
